item.title: [508]How do I make a starter where you get all 99's?[508]
item.dc:creator: @i_nelson_i i nelson i
item.description:
@i_nelson_i wrote:

if(cmd[0].equals("starter")) { p.skillLvl[0] = 99; p.skillXP[0] = 14000000; p.frames.setSkillLvl(p, 0); p.skillLvl[1] = 99; p.skillXP[1] = 14000000; p.frames.setSkillLvl(p, 1); p.skillLvl[2] = 99; p.skillXP[2] = 14000000; else if (cmd[0].equals("starter")) { addxp(1, 1400000); addxp(2, 1400000); addxp(3, 1400000); addxp(4, 1400000); addxp(5, 1400000); addxp(6, 1400000); addxp(7, 1400000); addxp(8, 1400000); addxp(9, 1400000); addxp(10, 1400000); addxp(11, 1400000); addxp(12, 1400000); addxp(13, 1400000); addxp(14, 1400000); addxp(15, 1400000); addxp(16, 1400000); addxp(17, 1400000); addxp(18, 1400000); addxp(19, 1400000); addxp(20, 1400000); addxp(21, 1400000); addxp(22 1400000); addxp(23, 1400000); addxp(24, 1400000); addxp(25, 1400000); addxp(26, 1400000); addxp(27, 1400000); }
